questions.query: In the past quarter, has a facility/department staff meeting been conducted to give direction and share general progress of facility to staff including performance of services delivery indicators? (check report/minutes)
Evidence of quality management structure at facility level and leadership stewardship of the same?
Quality improvement Team (or WITs for small facilities) in Place?

In the last one quarter, has the facility been comprehensively supervised by the S/CHMT? (Visits by S/County program officers to support particular health components not counted as County Supervision)
In the last one month, how many WIT meetings have been conducted? See wit meeting templates in WIT file
Were performance process indicators reviewed in those meetings?
Were action points from meetings implemented?
Was DQA done for the last month data before being uploaded to DHIS/reported to Sub-County?
Were client satisfaction exit interviews conducted for at least 20 clients in the last month?
Is the ANC register in use correctly?(check for completeness and correctness of at least 10 most recent pages)
Is the HIV status of all women known in the ANC register?
How many HIV positive pregnant women attended ANC in the month?

children.query: How many were staged using WHO criteria?
How many were offered Cotrimoxazole?
How many were on/started on HAART?
How many were given/had NVP/AZT for their unborn babies?
How many have a viral load not older than 6 months?

questions.query: Is there a system available to support PMTCT clients failing ART? Specify
Is the HEI register in use correctly and updated?
Check at least 20 HEI in cohorts. Proportion that is correctly filled and up to date.

children.query: 6 weeks- was DBS done and result documented?
10 weeks- is the HEI on CTX and NVP?
6 months- what is the feeding option?
12 months- was PCR test done?
18 months- was the final HIV test done? What was the final outcome?
If there was any HEI who was confirmed positive in the month, was he/she started on HAART?
Was infant updated in NASCOP website?

questions.query: Is the mother â€“ Infant pair register available and in use? Check for completion
Are the mothers and HEI files joined to form one file for each pair?
Is there an existing filing system to quickly identify mother baby pairs who miss appointment?
Is there a defaulter tracing register in place? Is it updated?

children.query: No of defaulters______
No tracked and brought back to care__________
Success rate (i/ii) ______ %

questions.query: Is the stock of HAART available in MCH enough to last 3 months? (NB: Not buffer stock)
Is the stock of pediatric NVP and AZT enough to last 3 months? (NB: Not buffer stock and AZT)
Is the stock of RTKs in MCH enough to last 3 months? (NB: Not buffer stock)
Is the stock of Cotrimoxazole enough to last 3 months? (NB: Not buffer stock)
Check the post-natal register for 20 entries done in the last month

children.query: Is it filled correctly and completely?
Is the HIV status of every mother (of the 20) known and documented in the register?
Number of post-natal women on/started modern method of family planning in the month (out of the 20)

questions.query: What family planning options are currently being provided in this facility? (A site should offer at least 5 methods of FP)

children.query: Male condoms
Female condoms
Combined oral contraceptives
Progestogen only pills
Injectables (IM and/or SC)
IUCDs
Emergency contraceptive pills
Implants
Vasectomy
Tubal ligation
Others (specify)

children.query: Post-natal clinic?
Maternity?
CCC?
In which other service areas/units offer FP counselling/commodities offered? Specify
Are women living with HIV offered cervical Cancer screening services as part of routine care?
Screening method used
Availability of cervical cancer screening register and monthly summary

Count Number of clients screened in last 3 months
Positive lesions identified
Positive lesions treated

children.query: How many maternity WIT meetings have been conducted?
Were performance process indicators reviewed in those meetings?
Were action points from meetings implemented?
Was DQA done for last month data before uploaded to DHIS/reported to Sub-County?

questions.query: Using the record of the last one month;

children.query: Number of deliveries in the last one month
Number of neonatal deaths in last one month
Number of neonatal death audits/reviews conducted
Number of maternal deaths in last one month
Number of maternal death audits/reviews conducted
Were action points from the audits implemented?

questions.query: Are the following services offered in this maternity unit?

children.query: National guidelines for quality obstetric and antenatal care
Danger signs for mother and baby poster
Infant and young child feeding practices chart
Breastfeeding poster
Neonatal resuscitation chart
Infection prevention chart
PMTCT guidelines version 2016 or ART Guidelines version 2018
Kangaroo Mother Care

children.query: Outpatient
Chronic care clinics
Inpatient
TB clinic
FP clinic
MCH

questions.query: Is the stock of rapid Test Kits enough to last 3 months? (NB: Not buffer stock)
Is there a linkage in each of the above departments?
Confirm whether all the clients who tested positive in the last month and confirm whether they were successfully linked to care? With a CCC number indicated in the linkage register.
Is there a system to identify clients who miss their appointments immediately?
Is there a defaulter register in place and used correctly and up to date?
Is a written SOP for identifying and tracking defaulters available?
Pull 20 files from Adults patients seen last month randomly(Care and Treatment)

children.query: What percent of reviewed charts document WHO staging at the last clinical assessment?
What percent of reviewed charts have documentation of adherence assessment at the last clinical visit?
What percent of charts reviewed have documentation of VL within the appropriate interval per the national guidelines?
What percent of charts/patient records/beneficiary records reviewed have documentation of CTX prescription within an appropriate interval per the national guidelines/at the last clinical assessment?
What percent of charts reviewed have documentation of a nutrition assessment (i.e. weight/height and BMI or MUAC) per national guidelines at the last visit?
What percent of charts reviewed have documentation that data from the nutrition assessment was used to categorize the patientâ€™s nutrition status per national guidelines?
What percent of charts reviewed have documentation of a 4 symptom TB screen at the last clinical assessment (i.e. cough, fever, weight loss, and history of TB contacts)?
Do patients with a positive screen (suspected of TB) have documented evidence of a diagnostic work-up (gene Xpert)?
What percent of charts for clients who screened -ve for TB have documentation of IPT offered?
Is a written SOP or clinic algorithm available for monitoring patients on ART and responding to results of viral load tests?
Does the WIT review viral load results regularly and institute appropriate follow on action points?
Do clients have access to at least five contraceptive methods at the CCC?

children.query: A written policy for disclosure of HIV status to adolescents (visual inspection
A written policy for consent for HIV testing and counselling for adolescents including provisions for testing of emancipated minors (visual inspection)
Adolescent-specific support groups, or offering extended/weekend hours for adolescents to receive clinical services
Sexual and reproductive health services, including education and family planning, offered to adolescents
Services geared to adolescent boys and girls to enhance patient engagement and retention
Does the facility have APOC guidelines?
